```{R}
library(reticulate)
```

```{python}
def whGen(s1, s2, s3):
    s1 = 171*s1 % 30269
    s2 = 172*s2 % 30307 
    s3 = 170*s3 % 30323

    r = (s1/30269 + s2/30307 + s3/30323) % 1

    return s1, s2, s3, r
```

```{python}
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
s1 = 9123
s2 = 14994
s3 = 1034
r = 0

numerosGenerados = []

for _i in range(1000):
    s1, s2, s3, r = whGen(s1,s2,s3)
    numerosGenerados.append(r)

plt.hist(numerosGenerados)
plt.
plt.show()
```
